pageProps.content:
Experience

Lion Sands Tinga Lodge enjoys a spectacular setting in the Kruger National Park’s Tinga Concession & overlooks the Sabie River.
The 5,000 hectares private concession invites a variety of wildlife & exciting safari activities. Guests can explore off-road driving, night drives, follow in the footsteps of a leopard, track down a herd of elephants, or simply wait for them to come to you.

Stay

Lion Sands Tinga Lodge includes 9 contemporary safari suites overlooking the Sabie River.
Each air-conditioned suite features an en-suite bathroom with an indoor & outdoor shower as well as a private plunge pool where lazy afternoons can be spent relaxing in the sun. Each suite has an open-plan design with a lounge & dining area.
There is also a 2-bedroom family villa. Hi’Nkweni Villa offers total privacy & wonderful views of the Sabie River from its private viewing deck & pool. This villa is ideal for families with younger children desiring to have a more exclusive safari experience. Guests staying at Hi’Nkweni Villa will have a dedicated butler, field guide & safari vehicle for the duration of their stay.
The main lodge area features a large wooden river deck, cosy lounge & bar area, swimming pool & spa.

Activities

Plenty of activities are available at Lion Sands Tinga Lodge. The most popular is their open 4x4 game drives & bush walks. Guest can get close encounters with some of Africa’s wildest animals.
A highlight for most is spending a night in Tinyeleti Treehouse, a romantic treehouse set up in a remote corner of the bush, not too far from camp. Guests can enjoy a private dinner in their treehouse before falling asleep under the stars.
Other exciting activities include spa treatments & community initiatives.

subfolders.title: Hamiltons Tented Camp
subfolders.description: Situated within a private concession in the world-renowned Kruger National Park, Hamiltons Tented Camp takes you back to an era where grace & style were the epitome of luxurious living.  Named after Colonel Stephenson Hamilton who was instrumental in establishing the world-renowned Kruger National Park, Hamiltons Tented Camp offers guests a luxurious safari adventure in a remote & pristine bush setting.

subfolders.title: Hoyo Hoyo Safari Lodge
subfolders.description: An earthy, traditional Tsonga-styled camp, Hoyo Hoyo Safari Lodge offers a unique safari experience on the banks of the Mluwati River in the heart of the Kruger National Park. Located in a private concession, off-road game driving is permitted & guests can therefore expect close encounters with Africa’s Big 5 in a remote & pristine wilderness environment.

subfolders.title: Imbali Safari Lodge
subfolders.description: Situated within a private concession in the world-renowned Kruger National Park, Imbali Safari Lodge offers excellent Big 5 game viewing throughout the year. Imbali aims to provide their guests with superb hospitality, exceptional service & gastronomic excellence – ensuring an unforgettable safari experience.

subfolders.title: Lion Sands Hi'Nkweni Villa
subfolders.description: Lion Sands Hi’Nkweni Villa is an exclusive & private piece of paradise in the Kruger National Parks’ Tinga Concession & overlooks the Sabie River. The villa is part of Lion Sands Tinga Lodge but operates & functions privately so that guests have an exclusive safari experience.

subfolders.title: Lion Sands Narina Lodge
subfolders.description: Lion Sands Narina Lodge enjoys a spectacular setting in the Kruger National Park’s Tinga Concession & overlooks the Sabie River.   The 5,000 hectares private concession invites a variety of wildlife & exciting safari activities.  Guests can explore off-road driving, night drives, follow in the footsteps of a leopard, track down a herd of elephants, or simply wait for them to come to you.

subfolders.title: Lion Sands Tinga Lodge
subfolders.description: Lion Sands Tinga Lodge enjoys a spectacular setting in the Kruger National Park’s Tinga Concession & overlooks the Sabie River.   The 5,000 hectares private concession invites a variety of wildlife & exciting safari activities.  Guests can explore off-road driving, night drives, follow in the footsteps of a leopard, track down a herd of elephants, or simply wait for them to come to you.

subfolders.title: Pafuri Luxury Tented Camp
subfolders.description: Pafuri Luxury Tented Camp enjoys a unique & remote setting in the far north of the Kruger National Park.   The concession lies in a vast triangle between the Limpopo & Luvuhu Rivers along South Africa’s northeastern frontier.  Between them, the two great valleys embrace one of Africa’s most spectacular landscapes with mountains and gorges in the west giving way to plains, pans, baobabs and fever tree forests in the east.

subfolders.title: Singita Lebombo
subfolders.description: The Singita brand of lodges offers a premier safari experience like no other!  Contemporary & luxurious in style, Singita will exceed expectations from beginning to end. The ultra-modern & beautifully decorated Singita Lebombo is located within a private concession in the Kruger National Park & boasts some of the best wildlife viewing in the country.

subfolders.title: Singita Sweni
subfolders.description: The Singita brand of lodges offers a premier safari experience like no other!  Contemporary & luxurious in style, Singita will exceed expectations from beginning to end. The ultra-modern & beautifully decorated Singita Sweni is located within a private concession in the Kruger National Park & boasts some of the best wildlife viewing in the country.

subfolders.title: The Outpost
subfolders.description: The Outpost boasts is set within a private concession in the Kruger National Park, on a hill overlooking the Luvuhu River.   Contemporary architecture makes use of concrete & steel with state-of-the-art retractable, remote-controlled screens offering 180 degrees of uninterrupted bush views.

whatWeLoveItems: Luxury suites with private plunge pools
Beautiful views over the Sabie River
Spend the night in a remote treehouse
Private concession setting – night drives permitted
